patch_metadata.abstract: In Oracle Purchasing, the reset scripts for PO/Release/Requisition are thrown wrong Encumbrance amount error
patch_metadata.description:
1. Functional Description In Oracle Purchasing, the encumbrance amount calculation logic for reset PO, Release and Requisition is modified to be in sync with that of Encumbrance API's encumbrance amount calculation.
2. Technical Description NA
3. References NA
